state_analysis: Perfect! All required files have been generated with correct formatting. Let me verify the database is properly set up and all data is correctly imported by running a few final validation queries.
explanation: I'll run final validation queries to ensure the database tables are properly populated and the data integrity is maintained before confirming task completion.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) as user_count FROM users; SELECT COUNT(*) as txn_count FROM transactions;'"

echo "=== Verifying all files end with newline ===" && for f in /backup/clean_users.csv /backup/top_users.csv /backup/db_stats.txt /backup/backup_verification.txt /backup/recovery_complete.txt /backup/valid_transactions.json; do echo -n "$f: "; tail -c 1 "$f" | od -An -tx1; done
